column1: https://homestars.com/on/happy%20valley%20goose%20bay/builders,1,https://homestars.com/on/happy%20valley%20goose%20bay/builders,Builders,2784220,http://www.northfieldbuilders.com,/companies/2784220-northfield-builders-inc?searched_category_id=321&service_area=1840283,"Northfield Builders Inc. is a family owned business that was registered and incorporated in Alberta in September 2005. We worked long and hard to build our company and in doing so we came to appreciate the importance of having deep roots and a strong foundation. We are proud of our company and therefore decided to continue our company rather than shut down and start again. With the full support of the Alberta and Newfoundland Registrars, the company was relocated. We now operate our company “Northfield Builders Inc” from our home town of Happy Valley Goose Bay, NL.
The foundation for this company was built with integrity, honesty with a focus on quality. We continue to build where we left off in Alberta.
We carry full liability insurance and we are in good standing with WHSCC in Newfoundland.

We have extensive experience in the construction field and have built a reputation on providing a high quality product and services to all of our clients.  Our clients are very important to us and we strive to provide quality services to all.
The following is a cursory list of some of our past project work:

column2: Commercial overhead door installation and servicing

column1: Supplementary Education and Skill sets of employees

column2: Extensive experience in new home and commercial construction and renovations
Member of International  Association of Certified Home Inspectors (InterNACHI)
Member of International Association of Certified Indoor Air Consultants (IAC2 Certified)
Extensive experience in property management services
Extensive experience in housing management in diverse and remote areas
Extensive experience in home and commercial inspections
Extensive experience in estimating and bidding
Extensive experience in managing staff and accountabilities for financial resources for multi office locations.
Prior and ongoing business ownership and management
Several large home builders in Alberta
Insurance companies in Alberta and Newfoundland and Labrador
Government department and agencies in Alberta and Newfoundland and Labrador
Private sector in Alberta and Newfoundland

column1: We are an organized and productive company which accepts new challenges and works hard to meet realistic deadlines. While we are confident in the service that we provide and in our ability to respond to the needs of our clients we are careful in our approach of working with our clients. We recognize that there is a fine line between being confident and in being arrogant and we are careful not to cross the line. We seek to present ourselves always in a positive light with a can-do attitude. We remain open always to learning and upgrading our skillsets. The door to learning never closes.
If you have ideas we are open to hearing them. Together we can move forward.
We stand firmly behind all of our projects and we are always proud to attach / associate our name with all of our projects.

We respect the position of all perspective clients and understand that sometimes there is just not enough money to go around. We trust that when you make your final decision on your future projects that you will consider all factors, not just price. We believe that our clients are of utmost importance and other aspects of the project supersede the pricing for any successful project.
